ONLINE JUDGE.description: Online Judge flag used for reading local file as stdin

vector<int>.description: creates a vector<int>, but gotta go fast

pair<int, int>.description: creates a pair<int, int>, but gotta go fast

HashMap int->int.description: creates a unoredered_map<int, int>, but gotta go fast

HashMap string->int.description: creates a unoredered_map<string, int>, but gotta go fast

vector<type>.description: creates a vector<>, but gotta go fast

pair<type>.description: creates a pair<>, but gotta go fast
